viewData.name: LG LK5700PUA 49" Class HDR Full HD Smart LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy LG LK5700PUA 49" Class HDR Full HD Smart LED TV featuring Full HD 1920 x 1080 LED Panel, Supports HDR10 HLG Support via Streaming & USB. Review LG LK5700
viewData.long_description: Enjoy apps and Internet-based content with the LG LK5700PUA- 49" Class HDR Full HD Smart LED TV. This 48.5" LED-backlit LCD panel features a native resolution of 1920 x 1080, allowing you to view detailed 1080p Full HD images, and the 60 Hz refresh rate helps reduce the blur commonly associated with fast-moving, on-screen objects. As a smart TV with Wi-Fi and Ethernet connectivity, you'll have access to the LG Content Store to download apps, plus a full web browser for web surfing. Its two HDMI inputs will allow you to connect your digital HD sources, such as HD cable/satellite boxes or game consoles.
